title: $:/litClock/times/-14:00-Albert Camus
quote_first: The Home for Aged Persons is at Marengo, some fifty miles from Algiers. With the
quote_last: bus I should get there well before nightfall. Then I can spend the night there, keeping the usual vigil beside the body, and be back here by tomorrow evening.
